summary: An ordinance relating to the Municipal Waterworks System, providing for the construction of a pipe line to replace Cedar River Pipe Lines No. 1 and No. 2, between Landsbert and Lake Youngs, designating the same as one of the additions and betterments to and extensions of the Municipal Waterworks System contemplated by Ordinance No. 62959, authorizing expenditures and appropriating funds therefor.
